title: react-portfolio
description: The code for this project is built using React and Vite, without relying on additional libraries. This approach helps me to refresh my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript by not using extra libraries

title: Joselito's adventure
description: A game built in record time as a requirement for my graduation, undoubtedly my favorite example of my quick adaptability and rapid problem-solving skills, utilizing Unity for development.

title: Fruttask
description: Fruttask, a project I'm currently developing, utilizes AstroJS and NestJS. It's designed to deepen my skills and explore new technologies. Currently in progress
